website_summaries.verdict: A nice feature on this upright dustpan is the locking feature, which helps when you are picking up and dumping dust.
pros: Front edge can catch a lot of dust because the pan is designed to stay flat to the floor
Pan includes a locking feature for when you are dumping the dust
Large opening can hold a lot of debris
cons: The quality is not as high as you might generally expect on a commercial grade product

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this dust pan after getting burned on another ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this dust pan after getting burned on another dustpan I purchased from Impact Products. Janico Inc. had pictures on Amazon that made it clear that it was designed correctly. This device has a locking tray that releases when the handle is pushed down. That way the tray can be filled and dumped without the pan releasing prematurely. The release is simply to allow for storage flat against the wall if hung on a hook or a nail. The Impact Products dustpan has a latch which barely holds the pan in place which causes it to release prematurely. It is so cheaply made that the latching system will simply stop working after a few months use.
customer_reviews.author: MFORD

customer_reviews.title: Nice large opening
customer_reviews.text: Nice handle and large opening. Sits flush to the ground so all you sweep goes in. Also locks in place. Great for the garage and patio.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. Graulus

customer_reviews.title: The Best Dustpan Ever ! Dust Pan On A Stick !
customer_reviews.text: This dust pan on a stick is awesome ! I had back surgery which took some of my flexibility away and prevents me from bending low like I would have to with a regular dustpan ! I would highly recommend this to everyone because the less you bend the better chance you have of not hurting your lower back muscles !
customer_reviews.author: TR CRAZYMAN

customer_reviews.title: A spine transplant would be better
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE TO 5 STAR I have had this a while now The longer I use it, the better I like it. It is a tool to make house cleaning easier Works well. No problem for me to use with my bad back and my cleaning lady loves it. Not that exciting in my mind though except that I have grown to depend on it and often use it instead of a grabber tool to pick up things. Bought a second one to take to the pistol range to clean up my brass The clip to hold a small broom I bought is great for the range
customer_reviews.author: Terry Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Best for a pooper  scooper
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I bought it for. I am using it for a pooper scooper . Works great!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Not as professionally made as indicated
customer_reviews.text: It really needs a rubber strip since the edge is hard plastic and not flush with the floor. Has a slight wobble in it, which is annoying to sweep. I feel like I'm going to break it every time I unlock the swinging holder. It just snaps apart after I put a lot of pressure and this plastic piece bends until they snap away from each other. I'm always afraid it's going to break before it snaps apart
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Blevins

customer_reviews.title: this unit is great.
customer_reviews.text: Pan stays flat to floor, and for those that hurt when bending, this unit is great.
customer_reviews.author: Ric Foushee

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as intended
customer_reviews.text: This $32 dustpan is defective. The latch that goes into the hole to snap it open is not aligned right. The protrusion is above the hole so much that it is impossible to connect. I am not returning it because it was in a very big box, and I am disabled. I cannot take it to the post office. I will use it when I need it without standing it open. Beware, it doesn't work as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Sciulli

customer_reviews.title: Another online disappointment for me
customer_reviews.text: This would have been ok, but the bottom lip is not straight so the dust and dirt goes right underneath the hole. I tried to set a box on top of it to get it straightened out, but this did not work. So for me it has been a waste of money. If it had been packaged better it probably would have been ok.
customer_reviews.author: JKRV

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, BACK SAVER
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Has a great design with a very close to ground to accept the sweepings, even the fine ones. Also like the broom combs since I have long dog hair that sticks in the broom. My BACK Loves this too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a working dustpan
customer_reviews.text: All this "dustpan" really does is allow most of the dust pile to end up underneath the device, not inside it. There is no lip to catch small debris, so all this is good for is picking up large items. It is worthless as a "dust" pan, and the box it comes in is huge, so returning it is also impractical. Save your money and time and frustration, and get a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS Dust Pan!
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis AND a bad back, and this Dust Pan is a God Send! I got it to clean up our rabbit shed, and it works GREAT without hurting my hands OR my back! (And I bought TWO other one before I found THIS one! They were flimsy, thin and cheaply made. This one is ~SO~ MUCH BETTER!!! THANK YOU!!!
customer_reviews.author: DonnaGearhart

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to pick up doggy doo off the grass. Works great. Very comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Clem

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t sweep up nicely with bow at the bottom of dustpan.
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to tell if this would have been a good buy or not. It came to me broken, but even if it wasn’t broken, it was bowed. It wouldn’t have done a great job sweeping trash and dirt up with the big bowed gap in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Stone

customer_reviews.title: Need two hands to dump
customer_reviews.text: A bit of a pain because the dust pan isn’t fixed. When you go to dump it in the garbage, you have to move the pan because it is flipped up to the handle - kind of like folded up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my work place and it arrived cracked on the top. Still usable and a very good product, I just wish it didn’t arrive broken???
customer_reviews.author: Madi H

customer_reviews.title: Great dust pan
customer_reviews.text: We love this dust pan it picks up even the small things
customer_reviews.author: Unique

customer_reviews.title: Clean floors clean
customer_reviews.text: I really like this dustpan. It’s easy to sweep the dust and dirt into the dustpan that’s flush with the floor. Nothing gets better under it. Great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Helena

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my 84 year-old mother who couldn't bend ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 84 year-old mother who couldn't bend over after hip surgery. She loves it. The guys use it in the garage because it holds such a large amount of stuff. It stands by itself if needed, lies flat against the wall when hung up. I needed a lobby dustpan when I was raising all my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Design and idea is good, but handle construction very poor. The handle bent on the very first use while dumping the pan into the rubbish can. The handle is made of light weight tin or aluminum, very fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: made of very sturdy  plastic
customer_reviews.text: I was given one of the dustpans, but I wanted another for the backyard. I looked in several stores, but finally gave up and looked on Amazon. I was thrilled to find it. I needed a heavy duty one, as my others deteriorated within a year.
customer_reviews.author: J Yo

customer_reviews.title: Love this dustpan
customer_reviews.text: Love this dustpan. No more bending over to get the dirt. Also like that it stands and holds my broom. This leaves more space.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Yapp

customer_reviews.title: Saving My Knees and Back
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a good dustpan for the garage and this fills the bill. Works great and seems to be well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: RandyK

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: As described, got damaged in transit (I assume) and box was in very bad shape; besides that, it gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: Terrence Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, useful, just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This dustpan is the best, it's sturdy, doesn't tip over, and is exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: A bit expensive if I might say ... product description was right on ; light weight to carry around to pick up the debris around the drive way and inside the garage.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. I'm going to order a second one
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. I'm going to order a second one. I've thrown out my dust pan. This is great if you have back or neck problems. It eliminates the need to keep stooping down when you use the old fashioned kind of dust pan.
customer_reviews.author: catwrangler13

customer_reviews.title: Solid dustpan
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a solid dustpan, we will see how it holds up in a restaurant ! Will come back in a couple months to update review

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, this is a very sturdy dust pan and does fit flush with the floor.

customer_reviews.title: so great and saves your back
customer_reviews.text: This dust pan works great and really saves your back. It's so easy to justify up the office really quick and not have to bend over.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Very handy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this dustpan. No bending over so it’s essy on your back. Use it for our patio but works well in the house too.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wright

customer_reviews.title: No bending over. Materials are somewhat lacking the sturdiness ...
customer_reviews.text: No bending over. Materials are somewhat lacking the sturdiness I anticipated. Strictly for residential and light use. Very adequate price point in view of the construction and design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great after hip replacements
customer_reviews.text: Save un necessary bending. Worked great after hip replacements. Don't know how I lived without this.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is just like the dustpan we have at school in the cafeteria. It's well made and efficient!

customer_reviews.title: Convenient.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother in law. Works well, makes it easier for her to sweep.

customer_reviews.title: No bending!
customer_reviews.text: This has really been a huge help. It’s a worthwhile purchase.
customer_reviews.author: VictoriaDeon

customer_reviews.title: it was perfect except for the fact that she is very tall
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend, it was perfect except for the fact that she is very tall, and the handle wasn't. If it could be designed to telescope and become longer it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: renee dault

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: We are going to throw this away and try and find something more durable for outdoor lunchroom space. The aluminum handle of this is already bent and unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Elias

customer_reviews.title: works fine and saves your back
customer_reviews.text: my old one was worn out and was looking for a replacement. this one works just fine
customer_reviews.author: Roundman72

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Saves a lot of bending over for this 77 year old guy !
customer_reviews.author: Howard C. Conner

customer_reviews.title: Dustpan review
customer_reviews.text: I love my Janico dustpan! I have back trouble & because of its long handle, now I don't have to bend over to sweep up the dust.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Bennett

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Love my dust pan, good Quality and works as expected, thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: ivonneav

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for the aluminum handle. The only thing ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for the aluminum handle. The only thing I do not understand is the lock that is engaged, to keep the pan in place when you put it on the floor. Not necessary, but minor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dustpan Upright.. Excellent height for one short person..
customer_reviews.text: This dust pan is saving my back, wish I had it a year ago.
customer_reviews.author: Andi O

customer_reviews.title: durable easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have trouble bending over due to low back injury ied blast Iraq, this simple dust pan lets me clean up after myself. should have got one months ago, durable easy to use, not too heavy but not flimsy. lip edge flush with floor permits all the dust pile to sweep into the pan. I strongly recommend for back/hip/knee injuries striving for independence. should be on medical insurance independence of living equipment list if they are not cheap company.
customer_reviews.author: Skydocjohn

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: It does a really good job picking up small particles, like cat litter.
customer_reviews.author: Cinnamon

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product. A touch difficult to unlock it from the open position.
customer_reviews.author: Scout Finch

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2. 1 arrived broken & the other one was bent. VERY cheaply made. Will not buy again. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KatsView

customer_reviews.title: Floor clutter be gone!
customer_reviews.text: We have a pet bunny and this has literally saved my sanity. Easy to sweep up and dump leftover hay, shredded paper, and whatever else ends up outside his cage. If you are thinking of rescuing a bun, this is a go-to tool.
customer_reviews.author: Serfer Grrl

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use and convenient
customer_reviews.text: what's there to say about a dust pan? It is easy to use and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Malecki

customer_reviews.title: gets all the dirt up
customer_reviews.text: able to pick up most of the dirt, without leaving a pile behind
customer_reviews.author: patricia  simonin

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't fit flush against the floor - so dust and dirt don't go into the dustpan. very disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The stick/handle keeps falling over onto the floor. It won't stay upright.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Sigman Puccini

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product, been using this for weeks now and no issues whatsoever.

customer_reviews.title: doodoo sweep MASTER!
customer_reviews.text: CLASSIC! If you're looking for that classic all practical dustpan look no more.. this thing SLAYS.. it folds up neat when u have some doodoo in there you are too lazy to empty and its sturdy enough to pick up another load when needed! its GREAT! way better quality than what you can get at the local store!
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: handy
customer_reviews.text: lightweight and easy to manipulate, bought a small broom to go with it and makes my life easier.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great dustpan. Don't have to lean over, which is ideal for a person with a bad back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: Genuine piece of crap. It seems to be well made except the bottom edge which is supposed to be flat arches upward leaving about 1/8 inch gap. Tossed it into the dumpster because it is too bulky to re-pack and return.
customer_reviews.author: delbert d salyer

customer_reviews.title: it has a serious design flaw that renders it totally useless..
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS dust pan... it has a serious design flaw that renders it totally useless... It has a c-clamp on the handle to store out of the way attached to your broom, right?? well if you attach this dustpan to your broom, you will never be able to use it as a dustpan again because the flawed design turns it into a useless bent piece of crap that no dirt can be swept into... so if you want a good dust pan that looks like this one but actually is NOT a waste of money, you will have to get a metal one and pay twice as much... sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Finch

customer_reviews.title: Just the dustpan--no broom included!
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed. I should have read more carefully, but all the others included brooms, so I thought this one did too. (I thought that a lobby dustpan included a broom). Why does it have a clip for a broom, when there's no broom? Too much to not include a broom!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Otis

product_meta.title: Janico 1085 Commercial Lobby Dustpan Upright, Aluminum Handle, 37” Length, Black
product_meta.description: Item Package Quantity:1There is nothing worse than having to sweep and sweep again to get all the dirt and debris into a flimsy commercial dustpan. With the Janico Upright Lobby Dustpan, one swipe is all you need! The Janico Lobby Dustpan is designed to eliminate the gap between the pan and the floor, allowing for more effective sweeping and a more thorough clean. Lightweight materials and a comfortable height handle make using this dustpan a breeze. Whether you are shopping for your business office, restaurant, store, cinema, home, or even for outdoor use, the Janico Lobby Dustpan is exactly what you've been looking for! There is FINALLY a dustpan on the market that prevents dust and debris from sliding underneath it, that does not aggravate back pain, and that does not come loose after just a few uses - the Janico Lobby Dustpan! This dustpan is designed for effective sweep up and durability, and with an overall height of 40 inches, is perfect for comfortable use without stooping over. Suitable for use almost anywhere, the Janico Lobby Dustpan makes sweeping up even the most stubborn materials simple. Whether you're on the construction site, or managing a retail store, this dustpan is exactly what your maintenance closet needs. Order your Janico Lobby Dustpan today and finally enjoy an effective clean up!
feature_bullets: A front edge that is perfectly flush with the floor, preventing dust and larger pieces from escaping under the dustpan
A screw free handle! Stand up dustpan
Lock feature when dumping dirt out of dustpan with comfortable long handle grip
Comfortable use due to 37" handle height, Effective clean up of tough material like sand

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars142 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
